Sequence Information.Source: Synthetic construct(derived from Hepatitis C virus(HCV) polyprotein)
Sequence Information.Target Organism: [Ref.14694985]Hepatitis C virus(HCV):inhibition of activation of NS3-6K protease(50 nM)(30% inhibition at 3 µM).
Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: No hemolysis information or data found in the reference(s) presented in this entry
Sequence Information.Cytotoxicity: No cytotoxicity information found in the reference(s) presented
Sequence Information.Mechanism of action: HCV NS3 protease is essential for the processing of HCV polyprotein, this protease is a target of choice to control HCV replication. The peptide was demonstrated that can indeed block the activity of NS3 and thus inhibit HCV replication

Literature.Title: Peptide inhibitors of hepatitis C virus NS3 protease.
Literature.Author: Portal-Núñez S, González-Navarro CJ, García-Delgado M, Vizmanos JL, Lasarte JJ, Borrás-Cuesta F.
